programme.title: College Basketball

programme.title: College Basketball

programme.title: College Basketball

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Mustangs play their home finale as they face the Orange. SMU has lost two straight at home, to Wake Forest and Clemson, but remains in contention for an ACC Tournament quarterfinal berth. Syracuse ends its regular season by hosting Virginia.
